title: Ticket #5170: condor_reconfig zeros update SequenceNumber, looks like dropped update
description: We've been seeing a high number of dropped updates in the start UpdatesHistory bitmap in chtc. Turns out that condor_reconfig of a startd will zero the update sequence number, and looks like a dropped update to the collector.
remarks:
Code should be reviewed, then back-ported to the 8.4 branch.

2015-Nov-11 09:20:42 by gthain:
REVIEW

Generally, looks good. I'm a little grumpy that both CollectorList and and DCCollectorAdSequences have a method named getAdSeq, one of which returns a pointer, the other a reference.

CollectorList::sendUpdates should just call CollectorList::getAdSeq, instead of duplicating the code.

2015-Nov-19 10:24:26 by johnkn:
no version history. this 'bug' was in the product for years and no one noticed but us...
